metadata.name: three beauties
metadata.description:
It is rumored that a king and princess lived in Cappadocia. The beautiful princess, the king's daughter, falls in love with a shepherd. The arrogant king who does not want to marry his princess to a shepherd and is against his daughter's marriage despite all his insistence. Realizing that she could not convince her father, the princess runs away with her lover one night. After the escape, the shepherd and the noble young girl also have a child.
After all, the princess thinks to visit her father, thinking that the king's stubbornness will be broken after the baby is born. He tells the King's Soldiers to find the girl and the shepherd. Cornered by the soldiers chasing them, the poor princess and her family realize they can no longer escape. At that moment, he prayed to God and made a preacher and waited for a miracle to keep his family together. In the fairy tale, the wish of the princess comes true and the whole family turns into immortal fairy chimneys.
